td.content: s:a male journalist aged 23 ys says he is having symptoms of moderate malaise 8 x week, in spite of treatment. o:Height 184 cm, Weight 69.8 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 14, persistent coughing during visit, HEENT: WNL, enlarged nontender cervical lymph nodes a:Tuberculosis p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Isoniazid - 100 mg tab, Rifampin - 10 mg/kg oral, and ordered Chest X-Ray.
